divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my front yard with my older brother, he was sitting i was standing. I looked in the sky, there wasnt a cloud in the sky, i saw what looked like a flock of white birds in a V shape formation. The more i focused i could see it was like a tight group of orbs like ive seen in the mexican orb fleet vids. About 15-30 orbs i guess. I immediately said "holy sh*t bro look!" then my bro hopped up and immediately saw what i was seeing like "wtf!?". The orbs floated in a long V shape, then got brighter and they began to move seperately, all while still floating in the same direction. As they moved they group together and faded into a cloud!!!! Unbelievable! Then faded back to orbs then back into a little cloud, then they just faded completely into the clear blue sky...
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Campbell
There were no other sightings in Campbell on or around July 24th 2012
Summary: Group of orbs in formation turn into clouds
